name: Pity Sex
description:
'''Pity Sex''' are an American [[alternative rock]] band from [[Ann Arbor, Michigan|Ann Arbor]], [[Michigan]]. The band formed in 2011, and released two studio albums – ''Feast of Love'' (2013) and ''White Hot Moon'' (2016) – prior to their split. The band combined elements of indie rock, shoegaze, dream pop and noise rock in their music, and were described by ''Pitchfork'' as "post-coital pop-punk". The band announced its reunion in 2022, as part of the Sound & Fury festival line-up.

Pity Sex has cited several bands as influences, including [[My Bloody Valentine (band)|My Bloody Valentine]], [[Pixies (band)|Pixies]], [[Pavement (band)|Pavement]], [[Dinosaur Jr.]], [[Kevin Gates]], and [[Yo La Tengo]].
